0010000101110010 0100001110101101 1 -> sum: 0110010100100000, cout: 0

0110010001001111 0100100101100101 0 -> sum: 1010110110110100, cout: 0
1000000111010011 0110001101010100 0 -> sum: 1110010100100111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
